name: Modern Velvet Sofa
alt: Modern velvet sofa with wooden legs and plush cushions in a living room setting
description: A cozy velvet sofa with a modern design, ideal for living rooms.
moreDescription: Crafted from high-quality velvet upholstery with solid wooden legs, this sofa combines luxury and durability. Its plush cushions offer superior comfort, making it perfect for lounging or entertaining guests. The sleek, modern silhouette fits well in both contemporary and classic interiors.

name: Minimalist Floor Lamp
alt: Minimalist floor lamp with a slim metal stand and white fabric shade
description: Soft ambient light with a clean, modern look for any corner.
moreDescription: This minimalist floor lamp offers a perfect balance between style and function. Its slim metal frame saves space, while the fabric shade diffuses light evenly to create a warm and inviting atmosphere. Ideal for bedrooms, reading nooks, or modern living spaces.

name: Abstract Wall-Art Canvas
alt: Colorful abstract acrylic painting on a large rectangular canvas
description: A hand-painted abstract art piece to elevate your room’s vibe.
moreDescription: Add a splash of creativity to your walls with this hand-painted abstract canvas. Each stroke reflects unique artistry, making every piece one-of-a-kind. Its vibrant color palette brings energy and sophistication to your home decor.

name: Wooden Coffee Table
alt: Rectangular oak wooden coffee table with smooth polish and rounded edges
description: Solid oak coffee table with smooth polish and rounded corners.
moreDescription: Built from durable oak wood, this coffee table offers both beauty and strength. Its smooth finish and rounded corners make it safe for families and stylish for modern living rooms. Perfect for displaying magazines, plants, or serving trays.

name: Bamboo Pendant Lamp
alt: Eco-friendly bamboo pendant lamp emitting a warm rustic glow
description: Eco-friendly bamboo pendant that gives a warm rustic glow.
moreDescription: Handwoven from sustainable bamboo, this pendant lamp introduces an earthy charm to your home. The natural material diffuses light softly, creating a calming ambiance. Ideal for eco-conscious interiors or rustic-themed dining spaces.

name: Wool Area Rug
alt: Large handwoven wool rug with geometric patterns on a wooden floor
description: Handwoven wool rug with geometric patterns.
moreDescription: This premium wool rug is handwoven by skilled artisans, featuring intricate geometric designs that add depth and texture to any room. Naturally soft and durable, it provides warmth and comfort underfoot while maintaining timeless elegance.

name: Classic Armchair
alt: Classic brown leather armchair with wooden legs and curved armrests
description: Elegant leather armchair with classic wooden legs.
moreDescription: Experience timeless comfort with this luxurious leather armchair. Crafted with high-density foam and sturdy wooden legs, it offers both durability and elegance. Perfect for reading corners or cozy lounges.

name: Handcrafted Wall Hanging
alt: Bohemian-style handcrafted wall hanging made of cotton rope
description: Beautiful boho-style wall hanging for cozy spaces.
moreDescription: Bring warmth and texture to your home with this bohemian-style wall hanging. Made from 100% cotton rope, it’s perfect for bedrooms, hallways, or creative studios. Each piece is handmade, adding a touch of authenticity to your decor.

name: Tripod Standing Lamp
alt: Wooden tripod standing lamp with a linen fabric shade for living room decor
description: Contemporary tripod lamp for a minimalist living area.
moreDescription: This stylish tripod lamp features a wooden frame with a linen fabric shade for a soft, warm glow. Its adjustable height and sturdy design make it perfect for modern and mid-century interiors alike.

name: Modern Bookshelf
alt: Tall modern wooden bookshelf with five adjustable shelves filled with books
description: Spacious modern bookshelf with 5 adjustable shelves.
moreDescription: This tall, minimalist bookshelf offers ample storage space for books, plants, and decor items. Crafted from durable engineered wood, it fits seamlessly into contemporary interiors while keeping your space organized and stylish.

name: Persian Pattern Rug
alt: Traditional Persian-style rug with detailed floral silk patterns
description: Luxurious Persian rug with hand-tufted details.
moreDescription: This elegant Persian rug showcases intricate floral designs inspired by traditional artistry. The silk-blend fibers provide a soft sheen and exceptional durability, making it a centerpiece for luxury living rooms and offices.

name: Nature Landscape Frame
alt: Framed nature landscape painting with mountains and trees on a wooden frame
description: Scenic nature view framed in premium wood.
moreDescription: Capture the tranquility of nature with this beautifully framed landscape artwork. Printed on high-quality canvas, it brings a peaceful outdoor vibe to your space. Ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, or study areas.

name: Marble Top Table
alt: Round side table with white marble top and gold iron base
description: Elegant side table with a white marble top and gold base.
moreDescription: This compact marble table adds luxury to any corner. The smooth white marble top paired with a gold-finished iron base gives it a timeless, elegant appeal. Ideal for modern lounges, bedrooms, or office spaces.

name: Wall Mirror with Frame
alt: Rectangular wall mirror with a thin metallic frame reflecting bright interior
description: Decorative wall mirror that adds brightness and space.
moreDescription: Enhance your space with this elegant wall mirror featuring a thin metal frame. It reflects natural light beautifully, making rooms appear larger and brighter. A great addition to entryways, bedrooms, or bathrooms.

name: Industrial Pendant Light
alt: Rustic industrial-style iron pendant light hanging above a dining table
description: Rustic industrial pendant light perfect for dining areas.
moreDescription: With its rugged iron design and matte finish, this industrial pendant adds a bold statement to any room. Perfect for kitchens, dining areas, or loft-style interiors, it delivers both charm and functionality.

name: Round Cotton Rug
alt: Soft round cotton rug placed in a cozy reading corner
description: Soft cotton rug that fits perfectly in reading corners.
moreDescription: This soft round cotton rug adds comfort and warmth to your floors. Its lightweight texture and neutral tone make it ideal for layering under furniture or creating a cozy nook in your living space.
